This property verifies that the signal ResetByteCnt is asserted to 1 under specific conditions. The check occurs at every rising edge of the clock MTxClk, unless the active-high reset signal Reset is asserted to 1, which disables the check.

The trigger condition requires that all four signals—StartBackoff, StateIdle, TxStartFrm, and PacketFinished_q—are simultaneously equal to 1 at the clock edge. When this condition is met, the property expects that ResetByteCnt must also be 1 at that same clock edge.
